name: Cats on Robot
description:
Cats on Robot

Cats are enemies of Robotic Vacuum. They would try whatever they can to prevent the robot from functioning. Luckily, they could not break the machine, and our humble machine could just work on trashes, as long as time permit .. Or, if there is no trash produced?

Operations

Collect all the trashes (paper balls) on the ground and shoot them into the trash bin within Time limit.

Use " WSAD" to move the robot. Move mouse to aim, and left-click to shoot. Press space to "Shake" cats off the machine if they attach.

Credits

Game Design: Dennis Liu | Lao Lu

Level Design: Lao Lu

Art Design: Dennis Liu

Programming: Dennis Liu

Special thanks to Prof. Brian Winn and the team from Penn State University for the excellent game design Cousera courses, as well as the shooting game code skeleton that was borrowed for developing this game.
